author: jvanzyl
msg: Get rid of some debugging junk.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Allow the specification of a maven.username in the maven:site-deploy target
so that usernames on the source and target machines need not match.
Martin and David Taylor couldn't deploy any sites. This should be fixed

author: kaz
msg: Updated the download links and added the version number because it
wasn't clear what version of Maven a user was downloading.  (thanks jon)
